title: AAI Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 06 Graduate/ Diploma Apprentice Posts
description: The Airports Authority of India (AAI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 06 Graduate Apprentices and Diploma Apprentices. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Electrical, Electronics Engineering, can apply for the AAI Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the edu...
